thought: To implement the workflow, I first need to define the necessary actions and trigger for the workflow. These include reading Google Sheets data, calling aiCompletion for classification, and sending messages to Slack. Also, a manual trigger is needed to start the workflow.
plan: Define an action function to read Google Sheets data with the specified documentId and sheetName.
Define an action function to call aiCompletion for classification.
Define an action function to send messages to Slack.
criticism: The current code does not define any functions for actions or triggers, so it cannot run or be tested.

functions.comments: Manual trigger to start the workflow on user click.
Read all rows from the specified Google Sheet document and sheet name.
Use AI to classify each commercial entry's Description as 'to Business' or 'to Customer'.
Send each commercial entry's Description, profit, and category to Slack channel #general.
